```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```
```{r packages, include=FALSE}
library(gmailr)
library(magrittr)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(purrr)
library(stringr)
library(ggplot2)
library(scales)
```
```{r auth, include=FALSE}
gm_auth_configure(path = "gmail_api_creds.json")

gm_auth(email = "dunkeld.oil.club.r@gmail.com", cache = ".secret")
```
```{r get_data, include=FALSE}
thread_ids <- gm_threads(search = "The Oil-Club") %>% 
  gm_id() 

messages <- tibble(
  id = thread_ids,
  body = map_chr(
  thread_ids,
  ~gm_thread(.x) %>% 
    extract("messages") %>% 
    extract2(1) %>% 
    extract2(1) %>% 
    gm_body() %>% 
    extract2(1) 
)
) %>% 
  mutate(
    body_clean = str_squish(body),
    date = str_extract(
      body_clean,
      pattern = "Date: ([A-Z][a-z][a-z]\\, [0-9]?[0-9] [A-Z][a-z][a-z] [0-9]{4} at [0-2][0-9]\\:[0-6][0-9])\\b",
      group = 1
    ) %>% 
      dmy_hm(),
    price = str_extract(
      body_clean,
      pattern = "£([0-1]\\.[0-9]{4}) ppl",
      group = 1
    ) %>% 
      as.numeric()
  )
```


```{r plot, echo=FALSE}
messages %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = price)) +
  geom_line() +
  scale_x_datetime(
    name = "Date",
    labels = label_date_short(),
    breaks = breaks_width("week")) +
  scale_y_continuous(
    name = "Oil Price",
    labels = label_dollar(prefix = "£")
    ) +
  theme_minimal()
```
